articles.title: 55 billion tons of iron uncovered, this colossal treasure is worth trillions and could shake up the global economic balance. - Farmingdale Observer
articles.description: The recent discovery of an enormous iron deposit in Western Australia has sent shockwaves through global economic and scientific communities. Estimated at 55 billion metric tons, this unprecedented finding represents not just an economic windfall but a fundam…
